and,1
that,000
but,0010
or,0100
as,0101
if,0111
when,00111
because,001100
while,011010
where,011011
so,0011010
though,0110000
since,0110001
whether,0110011
although,00110110
even,00110111
nor,011001000
unless,011001010
except,0110010010
whereas,0110010110
not,0110010111
and/or,01100100110
provided,01100100111
